pane allows the user to select one or more data sets to plot as cross sections. If a data set is plotted as a cross section, its value will be interpreted as an elevation and then be used to plot a line or lines on the front or side view of the model. Not all data sets are suitable for plotting as cross sections. Examples of data sets that are suitable include heads, the water table and Zeta surfaces from the Seawater Intrusion package.
